sentences.en: A molecule striking an advancing piston recoils with increased speed.
sentences.cn: 撞在前进中的活塞上的分子,会加速反跳.

sentences.en: A piston links to a drive shaft by means of a connecting rod.
sentences.cn: 活塞通过连杆与驱动轴相连.

sentences.en: A shaft on the piston forms the armature of a coil.
Because of particularity of structure and material, the piston must be measured by the non - contact method. but, at present there isn ' t mature technique.
sentences.cn: 由于活塞结构和材料的特殊性，对于它的检测只能采用非接触测量的方法，而目前尚没有成熟的技术。

sentences.en: Filling the cylinder with steam pushes the piston out.
sentences.cn: 填充汽缸的蒸汽将活塞推出。

sentences.en: Heat is thereby converted into mechanical energy of the piston.
sentences.cn: 热由此转换成活塞的机械能.

sentences.en: In the roundpiston VV carburetor, the piston is moved by intake - manifold vacuum.
sentences.cn: 在圆形活塞的VV化油器中, 活塞是由进气歧管真空移动的.

sentences.en: It is also generally conceded that Wankel engines are quieter than comparable piston engines.
sentences.cn: 转子发动机比通常的活塞式发动机噪音小也是大家所公认的.

sentences.en: Let's get the lathe to turn the new piston.
sentences.cn: 咱们用车床车[加工]新的活塞吧.

sentences.en: Steam in a cylinder expands to push a piston outward.
sentences.cn: 气缸中的蒸汽膨胀并推动活塞向外运动.

sentences.en: Tell the foundry to cast another piston.
sentences.cn: 告诉铸铁间再铸一只活塞.

sentences.en: The connecting rod is attached to the piston by the piston pin.
sentences.cn: 连杆与活塞的连接是采用活塞销.

sentences.en: The machine consists of cylinder, piston, rotary, shaft, gears, bearings, bolts, screws and stainless steel crusts.
sentences.cn: 那台机器由气缸、活塞、旋转轴、齿轮、轴承、螺栓、螺丝钉和不锈钢外壳组成。

sentences.en: The new series also includes a piston design that makes digressive forces for added pitch and roll control. This helps with performance over rough terrains and on off-road surfaces.
sentences.cn: 新系列还包括一个活塞设计，它可降低阻力，增加间距和滚转控制，这有助于军用车辆在崎岖的地形和越野路面的表现。

sentences.en: The piston froze in the cylinder.
The piston is now forced down , the burned gases expanding approximately adiabatically.
sentences.cn: 这时点燃的气体作近似的绝热膨胀而向下推动活塞.

sentences.en: The piston moves by steam pressure.
sentences.cn: 活塞在蒸汽压力下运动.

sentences.en: They use a piston engine instead.
Watt's engine also used hot steam , not cold air, to force down the piston.
sentences.cn: 瓦特的发动机也是利用热空气而不是冷空气带动活塞.

phrases.tran_cn: 活塞式压缩机；往复式压缩机
活塞密封，活塞密封圈；活塞油封

trans.tran_en: a part of an engine consisting of a short solid piece of metal inside a tube, which moves up and down to make the other parts of the engine move
